QuestData.Title: The Secret Compromised
QuestData.Description: Thanks again, $n. I recognize your name. Akama has entrusted you with his plans and so I will trust you as well.$B$BThe naga discovered I was working against Illidan and tried to get me to speak by torturing me. I did not tell them a thing - Akama himself taught me to master pain through meditation.$B$BIllidan asked the naga to bring me to him. He would have seen right through my flesh and into my soul's deepest secrets.$B$BAkama must be warned. Our plans are in jeopardy!
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Warden's Cage in Shadowmoon Valley and speak to Akama.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. Olum is one of my dearest friends and most trusted followers. His contributions have been of vital importance to our plans.
